sentences_summary: Join the Snowflake Team  Snowflake Careers Search results SNOWFLAKE CAREERS JOIN OUR TEAM Joining Snowflake means joining our mission - to mobilize the world’s data. It’s ambitious audacious and our opportunity remains stronger than ever . And that mission starts with you. Were hiring. EXPLORE ROLES OUR OPPORTUNITY YOUR IMPACT We’re at the forefront of the data revolution committed to building the world’s greatest data and applications platform. Our ‘get it done’ culture allows everyone at Snowflake to have an equal opportunity to innovate on new ideas create work with a lasting impact and excel in a culture of collaboration. Explore Careers UNIVERSITY RECRUITING All Snowflakes from the most senior to recent college graduates and interns work on important and engaging projects that deliver value and directly impact our customers. We’re looking for dedicated students who share our passion for ground-breaking technology and want to create a lasting future for you and Snowflake. Learn More VALUES  CULTURE Our values aren’t just words on a wall we choose to live these values through our work every single day. We’re passionate about our people our customers our values and our culture. ​​​​​ Learn More HOW WE HIRE Snowflake is growing fast and actively hiring across all locations. We would love for you to join us. Here are some easy tips to help you prepare for every step of the hiring process. Hiring Process BENEFITS  BEYOND Live your best life inside and outside of work. At Snowflake we believe its important that you and your loved ones are taken care of. ​​​​​​​ Explore Benefits STAY IN THE KNOW Introduce yourself and we‘ll notify you about new positions personalized for you. SIGN ME UP A notice to Snowflake applicants All Snowflake candidates should apply directly via our official careers page at careers. snowflakecom . Contact with any Snowflake employee andor recruiter will always come from an email address ending with snowflakecom or from an approved vendor alias such as no-replygreenhouseio  rolebotio . 568eeccacb10424d9fd379a5b6b456ab.

</form></script><script type="text/x-ph-tmpl" id="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-1569065694518"><div class="show-loader" ph-loading-img="show-loader.bind: showLoader" show.bind="showLoader" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-uS3YUp"></div>
<div class="phs-widget-block-area ph-widget-box" role="region" aria-label="Profile recommendations" key-aria-label="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-iDRlJk-rPlH4s" show.bind="!showLoader && jobResults.length" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-GpCETV">

                <ppc-content key="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-iDRlJk-jiUVXz" data-ph-at-id="heading-text" show.bind="showTitle" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-62taZV">Profile recommendations</ppc-content>
            </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="content-block" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-D0aeN4">
            <ul data-ph-at-id="jobs-list" if.bind="jobResults.length" data-ph-at-widget-data-count="${jobResults.length}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-zhj34U">
                <li class="jobs-list-item" repeat.for="eachJob of jobResults" show.bind="maxDisplayCount > $index" data-ph-at-id="jobs-list-item" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-cW14PV">
                    <div class="information" instance-id="Nkbz5Z" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-Zjt3ar">
    <span role="heading" key-role="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-iDRlJk-7RA4w5" aria-level="3" key-aria-level="ph-profile-recommendations-v2-default-iDRlJk-kiaS99" instance-id="Nkbz5Z-taVr9x" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-JoBONF">
        <a ph-tevent="job_click" ref="linkEle" href.bind="getUrl(linkEle, 'job', eachJob, '', eachJob.jobUrl)" data-ph-at-id="job-link" data-ph-at-job-title-text="${eachJob.title}" data-ph-at-job-location-text="${eachJob.location}" data-ph-at-job-location-area-text="${eachJob.cityStateCountry}" data-ph-at-job-category-text="${eachJob.category}" data-access-list-item="${$index}" data-ph-at-job-id-text="${eachJob.jobId}" data-ph-at-job-type-text="${eachJob.type}" data-ph-at-job-industry-text="${eachJob.industry}" data-ph-at-job-post-date-text="${eachJob.postedDate}" data-ph-at-job-seqno-text="${eachJob.jobSeqNo}" aria-label="${eachJob.title} ${widgetBundle['jobIdConnectingText'] | pht} ${eachJob.jobId}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-QCd9pm">
            <div if.bind="eachJob.title && eachAttr.name.indexOf('title') != -1" class="job-title" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-eVQJe0">
                <span if.bind="eachAttr.settings.label" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-wTh2it">${widgetBundle['title'] | pht}:</span>
                <i class="icon ${eachAttr.settings.icon}" if.bind="eachAttr.settings.icon && eachAttr.settings.icon.length" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-mQNkcW"></i>
                <span data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-T91VvM">${eachJob.title}</span>
            </div>
        </a>
    </span>
    <!-- Multilocation display type dropdown -->
    <p class="job-info" data-ph-at-id="job-info" if.bind="((enabledFields['location'] && enabledFields['location'].settings && enabledFields['location'].settings.displayType == 'dropdown') || (!enabledFields['location'] || !enabledFields['location'].settings || !enabledFields['location'].settings.displayType))" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-JYOYDN">
        <!-- adding the logic to display proper attributes in repeat and also adding hide class for internal explore(IE) purpose -->
        <span repeat.for="eachAttr of jobFields" show.bind="((['location'].indexOf(eachAttr.name) != -1 && eachJob.location) && (!eachJob.multi_location || eachJob.multi_location.length == 1 || eachJob.multi_location.length == 0)) || (eachJob[eachAttr.name] && (['title','postedDate','expiryDate','multi_location', 'descriptionTeaser','location'].indexOf(eachAttr.name) == -1)) || (eachJob.postedDate  && ['postedDate'].indexOf(eachAttr.name) != -1) || (['expiryDate'].indexOf(eachAttr.name) != -1 && eachJob.expiryDate)" class="${((eachAttr.name === 'location' && eachJob.location) && (!eachJob.multi_location || eachJob.multi_location.length == 1 || eachJob.multi_location.length == 0)) || (eachJob[eachAttr.name] && (['title','postedDate','expiryDate','multi_location', 'descriptionTeaser','location'].indexOf(eachAttr.name) == -1)) || (eachJob.postedDate  && eachAttr.name == 'postedDate') || (eachAttr.name == 'expiryDate' && eachJob.expiryDate) ? '':'hide'}" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-MEGrBy">
            <span class="job-location" if.bind="(eachAttr.name == 'location') && (!eachJob.multi_location || eachJob.multi_location.length == 1 || eachJob.multi_location.length == 0)" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-u91JEb">
                <span if.bind="!eachAttr.settings.label" class="sr-only" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-1LJrZb">${widgetBundle['location'] | pht}</span>
                <span if.bind="eachAttr.settings.label" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-hQgWzF">${widgetBundle['location'] | pht}:</span>
                <i class="icon ${eachAttr.settings.icon}" if.bind="eachAttr.settings.icon && eachAttr.settings.icon.length" aria-hidden="true" data-ph-id="ph-page-element-page8-Jtjao0"></i> ${eachJob.location}
